user.description:
Enter your token here
For security reasons, some devices require a token to operate,
the token can be acquired from this link: https://switcher.co.il/GetKey/
Example of Token: zvVvd7JxtN7CgvkD1Psujw==
Note: If you have devices with firmware version that is 2.31 or above, you must provide a token.
